text: You did a great job just now!
Come on, cut it out, you're embarrassing me...!

I can't believe that you, who had lost so much confidence,
could produce such work as a cameraman...

Haha, let me say thank you once again
— Yuika, thank you for your hard work as the photographer.

Aww, come on, that's enough!
I can only say "cut it out" so many times...!

It was fun, and I learned a lot,
so it's all good, all good.

Oh, by the way,
when are you planning to release this?

Huh? I'm thinking as soon as possible after we get back, but—
do you have any preferences?
For example, what about after the next live performance?

Rather than having them watch the live performance with
the sentiment of, "You girls worked hard during the training camp!".

Revealing it like, "Behind that amazing live performance, there
was this intense training camp!" would be more like a big reveal.

Wouldn't it be better if they could simply
enjoy the performance purely?

Exactly...!
Alright, let's go with Yuika's plan this time!

Thank you, Yuika!
That really helps...!

Haha, you don't have to thank me for that...
If I could be of help, that's all that matters!
